title: Original charger and earphone not working with my Pixel 3
content:
Hello, 

my phone does not recognise the charger and the earphones that came with it when I bought it.
Both the charger and the earphones work on my girlfriend phone (a Samsung).

The original charger does not work even when the phone is turned off. I tried cleaning the port, using the phone in safe mode, activating USB debugging but the same problems appear. 

I can charge the phone with a Usb a to c cable.

Any idea on what could be wrong? They both stopped working this afternoon.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
